trends: There have been no other sightings in Walden
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was ironically watching v the series back then. i heard a lot of commotion outside. when i went outside i looked up and saw numberous numbers of white lights in which was a larger than an airplane disc. it moved slowly. it did not make any noise. i thought it was a hoax first. but nothing can move that slow and stay airborn. i got on my bike and chased it. but it moved out of the area too fast for me to follow. i thought it was a bunch of ultralights with their engines off. but the lights never moved closer or further away. i was not afraid. i wanted to know more. i wanted to see what this was because it was not an airplane. it was not a helicopter. this was a flying craft not terrestrial. they are here.
Summary: slowly hovered over village of walden
